en.title: Enter these details from the letter
en.instructions: Enter the case number and access code from the letter the court sent you.
en.referenceNumberOrPinDoNotMatch: This case number and/or access code are incorrect. Try entering these details again. Contact the divorce centre if you need help.
en.errorLinkingCase: This case number and/or access code are incorrect. Try entering these details again. Contact the divorce centre if you need help.

errors.referenceNumberRequired: Enter the 16-digit case number to continue
errors.referenceNumberDigitsOnly: The case number is a 16-digit long number
errors.securityAccessCodeRequired: Enter the access code to continue
errors.securityAccessCodeAlphanumericOnly: The access code cannot contain special characters
